name: The Fool

reversed: Recklessness, risk-taking, holding back, fearfulness

reversed: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped talents

reversed: Secrets, withdrawal, silence, disconnected from intuition

reversed: Creative block, dependence, emptiness, smothering
